Package com.esri.mo2.map.prt

Provides map printing support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MapPrinter A MapPrinter captures the current state of the Map, such as MapExtent and Layers.
TocPrinter A TocPrinter captures the current state of the Toc, such as which Layers are shown.
 

Class Summary
BaseMapPrinter A standard implementation of a MapPrinter.
BaseTocPrinter A standard implementation of a TocPrinter.
PrintServiceLocator This class provides a set of static methods for getting print service related information such as default print service, media size names, printable area and printer's x,y margins
 

Package com.esri.mo2.map.prt Description

Provides map printing support.
